data.text:
Software Description:

MediaCoder is a universal media transcoder software actively developed and maintained since 2005. It puts together most cutting-edge audio/video technologies into an out-of-box transcoding solution with most extensive adjustable parameters letting you take full control of your transcoding.

New features and latest codecs are added or updated in weekly basis, which you get all for free! ... Download MediaCoder

Add to Download Basket
